_sText:
This mod is a remake of an unreleased patch from 2004 by Valve that included weapon balance changes. The changelog for this patch was written by Jess Cliffe on the CS forums.

This patch was supposed to be released in CS 1.6, but due to the fact that the weapon characteristics are hardcoded there, I released this patch for CS:S.

Note: This patch only works in singleplayer with bots or on custom server.
